existing_features.title: In the Home Dashboard "Quick Actions" section, remove the "Book Appointment" tile and replace it with a tile labeled "Log Avoid" (English text). Keep the tile in the same grid position and ensure clicking it performs a safe placeholder action (e.g., a console log) without navigating to a non-existent route.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Quick Action: remove "Book appointment" and replace it with "Log Avoid"

projectName: Update Quick Actions: replace “Book Appointment” with “Log Avoid”
